name: Mirage-Twin Sera
description: Appears and disappears unpredictably. Claims she has a sister nobody has ever seen.
questHooks: Says she saw someone 'split into two' in the heat shimmer.
Mentions a humming sound that makes mirages sharper.
Claims her sister knows a secret path under the lakebed.
notes: Some scavengers swear they’ve seen Sera twice in the same moment—one ahead on the ridge, one behind in the shimmer. She denies this, then later insists it was you.
